title: Are the Ward Skin bugs fixed now?
body: Wasn't mentioned in the Patch notes.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=skld3Qgo,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-29T18:28:31.274+0000)
>
> Yup, they should be! :3

I kinda liked the ward glitch, it felt nice having a different pink ward.
Lol, admittedly it was a cool bug.
